mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Nonnemacher [Nunnemacker], Uriah G.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Allentown, Lehigh Co., PA [Allentown, Lehigh County, Pennsylvania]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Nonnemacher [Nunnemacker], Uriah G. Patient Age: 19. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Amputation of little finger left hand from gun shot wound. Location Wounded: Cloyd's Mountain [Virginia]. Date Wounded: 1864/05/09 in action. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Result: Returned to duty.
